SEARCH
Package src.main.board

Class Property

java.lang.Object
src.main.board.Space
src.main.board.Property
public class Property extends Space
Represents a property in the game. A property has attributes such as name, price, rent, owner, and number of houses.

  • Constructor Details

    • Property

      public Property(String name, String imgfile, String propertyClass, int price, int[] rent, int index)
      Constructor for standard properties.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the property.
      imgfile - Image file associated with the property.
      propertyClass - Property class/type.
      price - Purchase price of the property.
      rent - Rent values based on the number of houses.
      index - Index of the property on the board.

    • Property

      public Property(String name, String imgfile, String propertyClass, int price, int rent, int index)
      Constructor for railroads. -- different because rent is based on the number of railroads owned
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the railroad.
      imgfile - Image file associated with the railroad.
      propertyClass - Property class/type.
      price - Purchase price of the railroad.
      rent - Rent values for railroads.
      index - Index of the railroad on the board.

    • Property

      public Property(String name, String imgfile, String propertyClass, int price, int index)
      Constructor for utilities. -- different because rent is calculated based on the dice roll
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the utility.
      imgfile - Image file associated with the utility.
      propertyClass - Property class/type.
      price - Purchase price of the utility.
      index - Index of the utility on the board.
